attributes.action: If petrol prices are coming down, why aren't our utilities?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister

In recent weeks we have heard about, and had the pleasure of suffering, the reduction in petrol prices.  

Yet we have heard nothing from our utility suppliers of a reduction in their charges.

They appear quick enough to increase, yet quieter than a mouse when it matters to us.

Please progress this as avidly as if we were a bank.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
